name: Laraan
description: Laraan is a Science-Fiction game about exploration in a desolate world. Created with a minimalist low poly style. Accompanied by a splendid movie soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
